    • Uses of AccessPlugin in ddf.catalog.security.filter.plugin

      Classes in ddf.catalog.security.filter.plugin that implement AccessPlugin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FilterPlugin
      This AccessPlugin performs redaction and filtering on QueryResponse objects as they pass through the framework.

    • Uses of AccessPlugin in ddf.catalog.security.operation.plugin

      Classes in ddf.catalog.security.operation.plugin that implement AccessPlugin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OperationPlugin
      Security-based plugin that check the pre create/update/delete/query request to make sure the subject has the appropriate attributes to make the request.

    • Uses of AccessPlugin in ddf.catalog.security.plugin

      Classes in ddf.catalog.security.plugin that implement AccessPlugin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SecurityPlugin
      Security-based plugin that looks for a subject using SecurityUtils and adds it to the current operation's properties map.
